summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2595, for the improvement of the alley in block 41, Capitol Hill Addition, Division No. 6, being the alley from Aloha Street to Prospect Street, between 21st Avenue North and 22nd Avenue North, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with asphalt or some other suitable material laid upon a proper concrete foundation, providing for the necessary surface drainage, under Ordinance No. 30250 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
